title: Kelaniya Grid Substation Augmentation under unutilized funds available from ADB Loans 2518/2519 (SF) SRI (Clean Energy & Access Improvement Project)
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. (Mrs.) Pavithra Wanniarachchi, Minister of Power and Energy, to award the above tender to the lowest evaluated bidder as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.  Cabinet also noted that no appeals have been received from the unsuccessful bidders.
